LanguageData.DMS_ArmySteed_APC.label: Army Steed
LanguageData.DMS_ArmySteed_APC.description: An unmanned armored personnel carrier for armed transport, it's operated by an on-board computer and has the capability to carry more than 6 personnel and cargos.
